enWisdom: The tongue is the interpreter of the heart
The tongue is the interpreter of the intellect
A person is hidden under his tongue
The tongue is the gauge of a human being
The tongues reveal that which is concealed by the inner consciences

Wisdom: الْمَرْءُ يُوزَنُ بِقَوْلِهِ وَيُقَوَّمُ بِفِعْلِهِ فَقُلْ مَا تَرَجَّحُ زِنَتُهُ [زِينَتُهُ‏] وَافْعَلْ مَا تَجِلُّ قِيمَتُهُ
enWisdom: A person is weighed by his speech and valued by his action, so say that which is weighty and do that which has great value
Words are the moulds of meanings

Wisdom: تَكَلَّمُوا تُعْرَفُوا فَإِنَّ الْمَرْءَ مَجْنُوءٌ [مَخْبُوءٌ] تَحْتَ لِسَانِهِ
enWisdom: Speak and you will be known, for indeed a man is concealed under his tongue
The merit of a man is known from his speech

Wisdom: كَلَامُكَ مَحْفُوظٌ عَلَيْكَ مُخَلَّدٌ فِي صَحِيفَتِكَ فَاجْعَلْهُ فِيمَا يُزْلِفُكَ وَإِيَّاكَ أَنْ تُطْلِقَهُ فِيمَا يُوبِقُكَ
enWisdom: Your speech is recorded, forever to remain in your book of deeds, so make it about that which brings you closer [to Allah] and beware of uttering that which will destroy you

Wisdom: يُنْبِئُ عَنْ عَقْلِ كُلِّ امْرِئٍ لِسَانُهُ وَيَدُلُّ عَلَى فَضْلِهِ بَيَانُهُ
enWisdom: The intellect of every person is indicated by his tongue, and his merit is evinced by his diction

Wisdom: مَا الْإِنْسَانُ لَوْ لَا اللِّسَانُ إِلَّا صُورَةٌ مُمَثَّلَةٌ أَوْ بَهِيمَةٌ مُهْمَلَةٌ
enWisdom: Without a tongue, the human being would be nothing more than lifeless statue or a wild beast
The indication of a person’s intellect is his speech

Wisdom: عِنْدَ بَدِيهَةِ الْمَقَالِ تُخْتَبَرُ عُقُولُ الرِّجَالِ
enWisdom: In times of impromptu speech, the intellects of people are tested
The speech of a man is the measure of his intellect

Wisdom: يُسْتَدَلُّ عَلَى عَقْلِ كُلِّ امْرِئٍ بِمَا يَجْرِي عَلَى لِسَانِهِ
enWisdom: The intellect of every person is deduced by what passes upon his tongue

Wisdom: يُسْتَدَلُّ عَلَى عَقْلِ الرَّجُلِ بِحُسْنِ مَقَالِهِ وَعَلَى طَهَارَةِ أَصْلِهِ بِجَمِيلِ أَفْعَالِهِ
enWisdom: The intellect of a man is indicated by his good speech and the purity of his roots is evinced by his beautiful actions

Wisdom: يُنْبِئُ عَنْ عَقْلِ كُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا يَنْطِقُ بِهِ لِسَانُهُ
enWisdom: The intellect of every person is manifested by that which is spoken by his tongue
